AI has transformed how we work — from writing documents to analyzing data — and now it’s revolutionizing how we handle images. Microsoft 365 Copilot is stepping beyond text assistance to empower users with **intelligent image editing and generation tools** built right into familiar Microsoft apps.

With Copilot’s new image features, you can remove unwanted objects, enhance visuals, restyle photos, or even generate brand-new images — all through natural language commands. Let’s dive into what’s possible today, where the tools live, and how you can make the most of them.

## Where You’ll Find These Features

The image editing capabilities in Microsoft 365 Copilot are integrated through **Microsoft Designer**, Microsoft’s AI-powered visual design platform. You can access them in:

- The **Photos** app on Windows (latest versions include “Edit with AI” options).
- The **Microsoft 365 Copilot** mobile app under the “Create” tab.
- **Designer** within Microsoft 365 web apps, such as PowerPoint and Word.

This seamless integration means you no longer have to switch tools to make quick, creative visual edits — Copilot brings image intelligence directly into your workflow.

## What You Can Do: Key Image Editing Features

| Feature | What It Does | Example Use | | --- | --- | --- | | **Generative Erase** | Removes unwanted objects or distractions from a photo | Delete background clutter or photobombers effortlessly | | **Background Removal / Replacement** | Isolates the subject and swaps out the background | Replace a dull office backdrop with a clean, modern one | | **Color & Enhancement Tools** | Adjust brightness, contrast, color tones, or apply filters | Instantly improve underexposed or flat photos | | **Style Transformations** | Change the artistic look (pop art, watercolor, sketch, etc.) | Give marketing visuals a consistent aesthetic | | **Crop & Resize** | Adjust image ratio or crop to focus | Format images perfectly for social media or slides | | **Edit AI-Generated Images Inline** | Refine Copilot-generated images without leaving the app | Modify colors, layout, or style after creation | | **Generate from Prompt** | Create entirely new images using natural language | Describe what you need — and Copilot makes it for you |

These tools are designed for speed, creativity, and accessibility, enabling users to achieve professional-quality results without complex editing software.

## When These Tools Shine

- **Marketers and content creators** can instantly produce branded visuals or tweak photos for campaigns.
- **Presenters and professionals** can upgrade slides or reports with customized imagery in seconds.
- **Social media managers** can generate and edit post-ready images tailored to each platform.
- **Everyday users** can clean up photos or experiment with styles quickly and intuitively.

Copilot’s real strength lies in **speed and creativity** — enabling anyone to make design-quality edits without deep technical know-how.

## Pro Tips for Better Results

1. **Use descriptive prompts** — Include style, lighting, and emotion for more accurate results.
2. **Iterate gradually** — Make one change at a time to guide the AI toward your vision.
3. **Keep your apps updated** — New AI image features roll out frequently.
4. **Check edges after erasing objects** — Minor artifacts can be smoothed with another quick pass.
5. **Save versions** — Keep originals so you can revisit or re-edit later.

Microsoft 365 Copilot’s image editing features mark an exciting step forward for everyday creativity. Whether you’re removing distractions, experimenting with new visual styles, or generating brand-new content, Copilot makes image editing fast, intuitive, and surprisingly fun.

AI is no longer just about writing or data — it’s now a creative partner that helps you express ideas visually, right where you work.
